self.name: messages.setEncryptedTyping
self.description: Send typing event by the current user to a secret chat.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Send typing event by the current user to a secret chat.

arguments.name: typing
arguments.description:
Typing.
Possible values:
boolTrue, if the user started typing and more than 5 seconds have passed since the last request
boolFalse, if the user stopped typing

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID
